title: window.name via innerHTML
description: Demonstrates a DOM-based XSS where untrusted content from window.name is written into the DOM using innerHTML.
objectives: Observe that window.name persists across navigations.
Identify innerHTML as the unsafe sink.
Use control of window.name to inject HTML or script.
hints: Set window.name to an HTML payload in DevTools, e.g., "".
Alternatively pass ?q=<payload> to set window.name before the sink runs.
